ROOT.ds100: select id,h.deptid,h.deptname,h.deviceid,h.devicename,devicetype,event,content,affect,h.reporter,h.checker,eventtime, to_char(eventtime,'yyyy-mm-dd')||' '||h.devicename||' '||case event when null then ' ' else event end as event, s.happenid,s.solvetime,s.resulttime,s.endtime,s.solution,s.result,s.reporter,s.checker from ys_db.ysh_ts_event_happen h left join ys_db.ysh_ts_event_solve s on h.id = s.happenid where s.endtime is null
